### 2.1 Controlled‑unit rents vs. market rents
* **Immediate effect:** Controlled units stay 5‑30 % cheaper than comparable uncontrolled units, depending on the strictness of the ceiling. (e.g., Glaeser & Luttmer, *American Economic Review*, 2003; Diamond, McQuade & Qian, *Review of Economic Studies*, 2019)

* **Case studies:**
